body:
Yes, sorry, didn't see that. 
As i understand, only way is to use previous version of framework, as new version will not be released soon, isn't it?

@SilverFire  @samdark 
This is still the case. Can it be reopened please.

I am using a validation URL and would like to enable/disable the 'Submit' button based on the result of 'afterValidate', but 'afterValidate' only triggers when the form is submitting. There are 'hacky' work arounds to this problem, but I don't want to pollute my code.

The javascript code is still checking if the form is submitting before triggering the  'afterValidate' event.
@czzplnm how about making a pull request?

issue.title: Fixes #12080. Whenever updateInputs is called, it will trigger 'after…
